title: 2021 World AeroPress Champion - Tuomas Merikanto (Finland) - Inverted
preparation_steps: Weigh 18.0 g of coffee and grind on Macap Labo 70D at setting 7.0.
Assemble the AeroPress in inverted position and place on the scale.
Prepare Third Wave Water Formula 2 and heat to 80 °C.
Have pitcher and target server ready for the 'pour from altitude' stage.

brewing_steps.instruction: Add 18.0 g of grounds to the inverted AeroPress. Start timer and add 50 g of 80 °C water between 0:00–0:10 (gentle pour).
brewing_steps.audio_script: You have 10 seconds to add 18 grams of grounds and gently pour 50 grams of 80-degree water.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Agrega 18g de café al AeroPress invertido. Inicia el cronómetro y vierte 50g de agua a 80°C entre 0:00-0:10 (vertido suave).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Tienes 10 segundos para agregar 18 gramos de café y verter suavemente 50 gramos de agua a 80 grados.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir very gently 3 times back and forth (0:10–0:18).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Now, stir very gently three times back and forth. You have 8 seconds.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Revuelve muy suavemente 3 veces de adelante hacia atrás (0:10-0:18).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Ahora, revuelve muy suavemente tres veces de adelante hacia atrás. Tienes 8 segundos.

brewing_steps.instruction: Continue pouring water gradually until total poured reaches 200 g (0:18–0:35, slow controlled pour).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue pouring slowly until you reach 200 grams total weight. You have 17 seconds.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Continúa vertiendo agua gradualmente hasta alcanzar 200g en total (0:18-0:35, vertido lento y controlado).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Continúa vertiendo lentamente hasta alcanzar 200 gramos de peso total. Tienes 17 segundos.

brewing_steps.instruction: Let the coffee bloom and steep (0:35–0:50). Wait patiently.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Let the coffee bloom and steep for 15 seconds. Wait patiently.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Deja que el café florezca y repose (0:35-0:50). Espera pacientemente.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Deja que el café florezca y repose por 15 segundos. Espera pacientemente.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir very gently 3 more times to re-homogenize the bed (0:50–0:58).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir gently three more times to mix everything evenly. 8 seconds.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Revuelve muy suavemente 3 veces más para re-homogeneizar la cama (0:50-0:58).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Revuelve suavemente tres veces más para mezclar todo de manera uniforme. 8 segundos.

brewing_steps.instruction: Push out any excess air from the chamber and attach the filter cap (0:58–1:10).
brewing_steps.short_instruction: Press out air • Attach filter cap
brewing_steps.audio_script: Push out excess air and attach the cap. You have 12 seconds.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Expulsa el aire excedente de la cámara y coloca la tapa del filtro (0:58-1:10).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Expulsa el aire excedente y coloca la tapa. Tienes 12 segundos.

brewing_steps.instruction: Allow to steep. At ~1:35 place pitcher on top. At 1:40 (≈100 s) flip the brewer carefully.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Let the coffee steep for 30 seconds. At 1 minute 35, place the pitcher on top and flip.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Deja reposar. A las ~1:35 coloca la jarra encima. A 1:40 (~100s) voltea el preparador con cuidado.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Deja que el café repose por 30 segundos. A 1 minuto 35, coloca la jarra encima y voltea.

brewing_steps.instruction: Immediately begin pressing from 1:40–2:00 (≈20 s press).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start pressing immediately. You have 20 seconds to finish the press.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Inmediatamente comienza a presionar de 1:40-2:00 (~20s de presión).
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Comienza a presionar inmediatamente. Tienes 20 segundos para terminar de presionar.

brewing_steps.instruction: From 2:00–2:30 swirl the brewed coffee and perform a 'pour from altitude' into another pitcher to aerate and cool.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Swirl the coffee and pour from altitude. You have 30 seconds to aerate and cool.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: De 2:00-2:30 agita el café preparado y haz un 'vertido desde altura' a otra jarra para airear y enfriar.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Agita el café y viértelo desde altura. Tienes 30 segundos para airear y enfriar.

what_to_expect.description: The 2021 World AeroPress Champion recipe by Tuomas Merikanto showcases advanced brewing techniques focused on water chemistry and precise temperature control. This method uses Third Wave Water Formula 2 for optimal mineral balance, a low extraction temperature of 80°C to highlight delicate flavors, and innovative manipulation techniques including very gentle stirring and the signature 'pour from altitude' method. Expect a cup with exceptional clarity, bright acidity, and complex flavor layers that highlight the coffee's origin characteristics. The inverted method with precise timing and gentle agitation creates a clean, structured profile perfect for showcasing high-quality single-origin coffees. The final aeration step adds a unique texture and cooling effect that enhances the overall drinking experience.
what_to_expect.audio_script: The 2021 World AeroPress Champion recipe by Tuomas Merikanto showcases advanced brewing techniques. This method uses Third Wave Water Formula 2 for optimal mineral balance, a low extraction temperature of 80 degrees Celsius to highlight delicate flavors, and innovative techniques including gentle stirring and the signature 'pour from altitude' method. Expect a cup with exceptional clarity, bright acidity, and complex flavor layers that highlight the coffee's origin characteristics. The inverted method with precise timing creates a clean, structured profile perfect for showcasing high-quality single-origin coffees.
what_to_expect.description_es: La receta ganadora del Campeonato Mundial AeroPress 2021 de Tuomas Merikanto. Combina un concentrado suave con dilución por bypass para máxima claridad y sabores delicados.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Esta es la receta campeona mundial de 2021. Tuomas Merikanto crea un concentrado suave que luego diluye con agua caliente. El resultado es una taza increíblemente limpia y delicada.

equipment: Third Wave Water Formula 2 (or prepared mineral profile)
notes: Recipe by Tuomas Merikanto (World Champ 2021). Focus on water chemistry (TWW Formula 2), two pouring stages with a low extraction point (80°C) and manipulation techniques (very gentle stirs, quick flip and press) followed by 'pour from altitude' for aeration and cooling.
notes_es: Receta ganadora del Campeonato Mundial de AeroPress 2021. Enfocada en claridad y delicadeza con método invertido y bypass.
preparation_steps_es: Enjuaga el filtro de papel con agua caliente.
Ensambla el AeroPress en posición invertida.
Muele 16g de café a molienda medio-gruesa.
